title: Systems of Linear Equations
body: Last year, at Haven’s Pond Car Dealership, for a particular model of BMW, Jeep, and Toyota, one could purchase all three cars for a total of $140,000. This year, due to $$inflation$$, the same cars would cost $151,830. The cost of the BMW increased by 8%, the Jeep by 5%, and the Toyota by 12%.
lesson: 7.2 Systems of Linear Equations: Three Variables
